Welcome to PySLAM’s documentation!¶

PySLAM is a collection of autonomous navigation methods used for Simultaneous Localization And Mapping built in Python. The intent of the project is to create application-agnostic object-oriented implementations of these methods to enable them to be re-used over time.

Note

This project is under active development.

localization

This module contains several Python based implementations for localization, mapping, and simultaneous localization and mapping.

mapping

Mapping module is under development

slam

SLAM module is under development

PySLAM
